Hi, I'm Cuong as a Creative Front End Developer.

Nice to know you.

A few things about me.

What is creativelang.com?

This website is a collection of bookmark and free e-book about Front End Development with the purpose of sharing my knowledge and passion for everyone.

It has been designed and built by hand from the ground up. It's handled through VueJS 2.0, NodeJS support API, database is controlled by MongoDB and all of things is compiled with Webpack.

Who is the owner?

As you know my name is Cuong. I live in HoChiMinh city. I have a special passion for Front End Development. Be a Great Creative Front End Developeron Awwwards.com is my goal.

Because I want to directly develop ideas with my creativity, I do not want to be limited in thinking and only following the design and marketing teams. As a fan of Front End, I will prove to the fucking developers who think FE is simple and easy that FE is an art.

Some of my best skills.

Main Skills

HTML5, CSS3, Materialize, Bootstrap, Bulma.
Javascript, AngularJS, VueJS, ReactJS, VelocityJS, Jquery, Pug.
Gulp, Webpack.
Search Engine Optimization.

Support Skills

JS stack: Node.js + ExpressJS + MongoDB
RoR stack: Ruby on Rails + My SQL
.NET stack: ASP.NET + VB.NET + SQL Server.

Soft Skills

Creative and strange thinking, open mind, management.

2+ years Front End Developer.

LeftCoastLogic - HQ in USA

Web Application - www.floware.com

This is my second company. Floware is a large web application include Email-Todo-Note-Contact.
I am working here to build a large web application based on the main technology AngularJS + RoR + Node.js. It was built for many years to be perfect.

The Nailsuperstore - HQ in USA

Ecommerce website - www.nailsuperstore.com

This is my first company. Nailsuperstore.com is a large and famous website about nail supply in USA.
During the time I working here, I gained a lot of experience in general about ecommerce product development as well as business strategy.
This website based on a tons of ASP.NET and VB.NET code.

My Goals
